name: AstroPath
description:
Use mouse cursor to select platforms

left mouse click to place them in the level

right mouse click to delete the object

A,D to move the character

Space to jump

Goal of the game: Create a path with the given objects to reach the goal(moon)

Platform sounds from: https://freesound.org

Music from: https://www.bensound.com

Character asset from: unity store 2D character - Astronaut
